headline.print_headline: Maryland Local Official Defies Court, Opens Meeting With Prayer
headline.main: Maryland Local Official Defies Court, Opens Meeting With Prayer

lead_paragraph: A county official in Maryland opened an official meeting on Thursday with a prayer referencing Jesus Christ, according to a person who attended the meeting and local media, two days after a federal judge issued an injunction prohibiting such a prayer.
